articles.title: Meghan Markle 'much more popular' around world than in UK – Britain 'treated her as other' - Express
articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE's time in the Royal Family was plagued with 'negativity', a royal biographer has claimed, as he explained this was due to the UK treating the Duchess 'like an other'.
